
get scoresway live games with goalscorers


## packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(lubridate)
library(conflicted)
conflict_prefer("filter", "dplyr")
source("functions.R")
```

```{r}
matches <- c(3454401, 3461782, 3461785, 3440979, 3436416, 3453908)
matches <- mtch
```

```{r}
current <- 0
```


```{r}
Sys.time()
l <- update_scores(current, matches)
current <- l[[1]]
comparison <- l[[2]]
# current %>% filter(stat != "FT") -> current
knitr::kable(comparison)
```
